comments:
It failed to start using JDK 1.3.1_10.  It works fine with JDK 1.4.2.  Eclipse 
2.1.3 works fine with JDK 1.3.1_10.  I'm not sure whether 3.0 shifts to JDK 1.4.

Eclipse requires a 1.4 version of the VM. Please refer to the README file
included with the download.

Thank you for the info.

Does it mean that I wouldn't be able to use 3.0 to develop applications that 
require JDK 1.3?

You need a 1.4 VM to run Eclipse, but within Eclipse you can still target an
environment that requires a 1.3 VM. 

Check out the preferences under Window -> Preferences -> Java. 

You can install a 1.3 VM and make it your default. I believe that you may have
to change the compiler compliance settings as well.
